duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage in 1-on-1 video calls with customers to present, market, and sell tech products, providing a personalized and helpful sales experience.
Deeply understand the brand, products, and key selling points to deliver high-quality sales experiences for customers.
Undergo ongoing technical and on-camera media training to maintain expertise in operating the technology that powers the 1-to-1 video calls.
Participate in ongoing development, preparation, and improvement for sales calls.
Learn the brand's mission and product knowledge, and suggest specific products to match customer needs.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's or Bachelor's degree preferred)
